title: Fast and Realistic Automated Scenario Simulations and Reporting for an Autonomous Racing Stack
dimension: AI Threat Recognition and Incident Response
summary: In this paper, we describe the automated simulation and reporting pipeline implemented for our autonomous racing stack, ur.autopilot.
